special_abilities.name: Stone Camouflage.
descriptions: The gnome has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

special_abilities.name: Gnome Cunning.
descriptions: The gnome has advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
descriptions: The gnome's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 11). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

actions.name: War Pick.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Poisoned Dart.
descriptions: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success
